quote: Sometimes people did this, closed their eyes for a few seconds and imagined it gave them insights into what it was like to be her. Only, at the end, they could still open their eyes and see.
quote_letters: SOMETIMES PEOPLE DID THIS CLOSED THEIR EYES FOR A FEW SECONDS AND IMAGINED IT GAVE THEM INSIGHTS INTO WHAT IT WAS LIKE TO BE HER ONLY AT THE END THEY COULD STILL OPEN THEIR EYES AND SEE
